body_html:
If you're reading one element at a time, why are you using a queue?

On Oct 11, 2016 1:36 PM, "Yandi Xia" notifications@github.com wrote:

@ebrevdo https://github.com/ebrevdo Thanks for the reply. I plan to use
this FIFOqueue for the input in my evaluation graph. And I don't want to
specify batch_size for my evaluation graph.

And yes, I have tf.train.batch in my training graph. And it works fine.

Thanks.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

body:
If you're reading one element at a time, why are you using a queue?

On Oct 11, 2016 1:36 PM, "Yandi Xia" notifications@github.com wrote:

@ebrevdo https://github.com/ebrevdo Thanks for the reply. I plan to use
this FIFOqueue for the input in my evaluation graph. And I don't want to
specify batch_size for my evaluation graph.

And yes, I have tf.train.batch in my training graph. And it works fine.

Thanks.
